data.text:
Noli me tangere: Bonnefoy, Nancy, Derrida

This paper examines the motif of touch and resistance to touch in Yves Bonnefoy’s collection of snow poems, Début et fin de la neige, 1992. The resistance encountered by the hand that seeks to touch, as evoked within Bonnefoy’s poem ‘Noli me tangere’, is suggestive of the problems and obstacles inhe...
